fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pacify a player at night, setting their attack value to None.
- Immediately accelerate the current phase. (Costs 6 Gold) (1 Free Use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Pacification lasts until you die.
- When you pacify a player, you will learn what their previous attack value was.
- You may not accelerate the day phase until at least four hours have passed since the start of day, or the night phase until at least six hours have passed since the start of night.
- If anyone is at majority vote when you accelerate the day phase, they will be hanged.
- Any time left in the phase when accelerated will be carried over into the next phase.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were neutralized by a Canadian Mountie.” (Factional Kill)
“You were forced to put your weapons away.” (Pacified)
“The sun is setting earlier than normal! The day is ending.” (Accelerate Day)
“The sun is rising earlier than normal! The night is ending.” (Accelerate Night)
